languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Технопровидец{/g} горделиво поднимается на ноги и произносит на явно непривычном для него низком готике:{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Духи машин{/g} отвергли мои мольбы. Священный механизм продолжит цикл страданий".

traits.locale_text: {n}Технопровидец поднимается на ноги, не сводя глаз с механизма. Тяжелые лицевые импланты издают дребезжащие звуки, формирующие в слова на непривычном для жреца низком готике. {/n} "Духи машин отвергли мои мольбы. Священный механизм продолжит страдный цикл".

languages.text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} rises proudly to his feet and says in Low Gothic, a language he clearly has not had much practice in,{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} have rejected my pleas. The sacred mechanism will continue in its cycle of suffering."
languages.original_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Технопровидец{/g} горделиво поднимается на ноги и произносит на явно непривычном для него низком готике:{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Духи машин{/g} отвергли мои мольбы. Священный механизм продолжит цикл страданий".

languages.text: {n}El {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}visioingeniero{/g} se pone en pie con orgullo y habla en Bajo Gótico, idioma con el que claramente le falta práctica:{/n} «Los {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}espíritus máquina{/g} han rechazado mis oraciones. El mecanismo sagrado continuará su ciclo de sufrimiento».
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} rises proudly to his feet and says in Low Gothic, a language he clearly has not had much practice in,{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} have rejected my pleas. The sacred mechanism will continue in its cycle of suffering."

traits.locale_text: {n}El visioingeniero se pone en pie con orgullo y habla en Bajo Gótico, idioma con el que claramente le falta práctica:{/n} «Los espíritus máquina han rechazado mis oraciones. El mecanismo sagrado continuará su ciclo de sufrimiento».

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}機関整備師{/g}はザッと立ち上がって、あまり使ったことのないであろう下位帝国語で話しだした。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}機械精霊{/g}は私の祈りを拒絶した。神聖な機械は苦しみのサイクルを続けることであろう」
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} rises proudly to his feet and says in Low Gothic, a language he clearly has not had much practice in,{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} have rejected my pleas. The sacred mechanism will continue in its cycle of suffering."

traits.locale_text: {n}機関整備師はザッと立ち上がって、あまり使ったことのないであろう下位帝国語で話しだした。{/n}「機械精霊は私の祈りを拒絶した。神聖な機械は苦しみのサイクルを続けることであろう」

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}引擎先知{/g}自豪地站起身来，以明显磕磕绊绊的低哥特语开了口。{/n}“{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}机魂{/g}已经拒绝了我的请求，这台神圣的机器将继续进行它痛苦的循环。”
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} rises proudly to his feet and says in Low Gothic, a language he clearly has not had much practice in,{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} have rejected my pleas. The sacred mechanism will continue in its cycle of suffering."

traits.locale_text: {n}引擎先知自豪地站起身来，以明显磕磕绊绊的低哥特语开了口。{/n}“机魂已经拒绝了我的请求，这台神圣的机器将继续进行它痛苦的循环。”

languages.text: {n}Der {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Maschinenseher{/g} erhebt sich stolz und sagt in Niedergotisch, einer Sprache, die er offenkundig nur selten je gesprochen hat:{/n} "Die {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Maschinengeister{/g} haben meine Bitten zurückgewiesen. Der heilige Mechanismus wird seinen Zyklus des Leids fortsetzen."
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} rises proudly to his feet and says in Low Gothic, a language he clearly has not had much practice in,{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} have rejected my pleas. The sacred mechanism will continue in its cycle of suffering."

{n}Der Maschinenseher erhebt sich stolz und sagt in Niedergotisch, einer Sprache, die er offenkundig nur selten je gesprochen hat:{/n} "Die Maschinengeister haben meine Bitten zurückgewiesen. Der heilige Mechanismus wird seinen Zyklus des Leids fortsetzen."

languages.text: {n}Le {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}technaugure{/g} se redresse fièrement avant de prendre la parole en bas gothique, une langue dans laquelle il manque visiblement de pratique :{/n} « Les {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}esprits de la machine{/g} ont rejeté toutes mes suppliques. Le mécanisme sacré va poursuivre son cycle de souffrance. »

The sacred mechanism will continue in its cycle of suffering."

{n}Le technaugure se redresse fièrement avant de prendre la parole en bas gothique, une langue dans laquelle il manque visiblement de pratique :{/n} « Les esprits de la machine ont rejeté toutes mes suppliques. Le mécanisme sacré va poursuivre son cycle de souffrance. »

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Mühedyum{/g}, gururla ayağa kalkarak Adi Gotik dilinde konuşmaya başlıyor. Bu dilde fazla idmanlı olmadığı aşikâr.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Makine ruhları{/g}, yakarışlarımı geri çevirdi. Kutsal mekanizma, acı çekme döngüsünü sürdürecek."
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} rises proudly to his feet and says in Low Gothic, a language he clearly has not had much practice in,{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} have rejected my pleas. The sacred mechanism will continue in its cycle of suffering."
